text: Zoila Lourdes Carmen Sandra Mendoza del Solar (7 January 1958 â€“ 4 October 2024) was a Peruvian businesswoman and politician. She was a member of the Peruvian Aprista Party. She was the Second Vice President of Peru from 2006 to 2011. She is the first woman to hold this position. Mendoza was also a member of the Member of Congress from 2006 to 2011. Mendoza died from a heart attack on 4 October 2024 at a hospital in Arequipa, Peru at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Vice presidents of Peru
title: Lourdes Mendoza
